rule_text: Charge and electronegativity neutrality are chemical guidelines for promising compounds.
The model learns chemical guidelines, implying that specific chemical properties are associated with desirable materials.
Materials with negative formation energy are stable.
A diffusion-based generative model for crystal structure estimation can be used.
Large language models (LLMs) can be used for inorganic materials discovery.
No specific material-property relationships or application predictions are mentioned.
